cancelSchedule(string).details: Computes and transfers the prorated amount for the current interval, then disables the schedule.

params.username: The username associated with the payment schedule.

cancelStream(string).details: Disables the specified stream and stops further payouts.

params.username: The username associated with the payment stream.

createSchedule(string,uint256,address,ui.details: This function allows an organization to set up recurring payments to an address.      It supports both stream (for payments every second) and schedule (for monthly payments).

params.amount: The amount to be paid on a scheduled basis.
params.oneTimePayoutDate: Timestamp of a payment to be made once As would a contractor payment would be made.
params.token: Address of token to pay in
params.username: The username of the recipient who will receive the payment.

createStream(string,uint256,address,uint.details: Sets up a stream that pays tokens to a recipient every second, starting immediately and ending at a specified time.

params.amount: The amount of tokens paid to the recipient every second.
params.endStream: The timestamp when the stream ends.
params.token: The address of the token to be streamed.
params.username: The username of the recipient who will receive the stream.

emergencyWithdraw(address).details: This function can only be called by the Paynest owner to withdraw tokens       that were mistakenly sent to the Org contract.

params.tokenAddr: The address of the token to be withdrawn.

getSubscriptionDetails().details: This function returns details about the organization's active subscription.

requestSchedulePayout(string).details: Allows anyone to request a payout of funds from the contract.

params.username: The username of the recipient who will receive the payment.

requestStreamPayout(string).details: Allows anyone to request a payout of funds from the contract.

params.username: The username of the recipient who will receive the payment.

updateOrgName(string).details: This function allows an organization to update its name or identifier for internal purposes.

params.newName: The new name to assign to the organization.

cancelSchedule(string).notice: Cancels an active payment schedule with prorated payout for the current interval.

createSchedule(string,uint256,address,ui.notice: Creates a payment stream or schedule for an employee or recipient.

createStream(string,uint256,address,uint.notice: Creates a real-time payment stream for a recipient.

emergencyWithdraw(address).notice: Allows the Paynest owner to withdraw any funds that were accidentally sent to the Org contract.

getSubscriptionDetails().notice: Retrieves the current subscription details for the organization.

requestSchedulePayout(string).notice: Requests a payout of scheduled funds.

requestStreamPayout(string).notice: Requests a payout of accumulated funds.

updateOrgName(string).notice: Allows the organization to update its name or other relevant identifiers.
